name: speaches
description: speaches is an OpenAI API-compatible server supporting streaming transcription, translation, and speech generation
info: Simple yet powerful audio models (Speech-to-text and Text-to-speech) on CPU only devices. Does not require GPUs.
template_rules: speaches is an audio-only model serving template on GPUs. With the Speaches template you can deploy text to speech and speech to text models in your cluster.
